title: Privacy & Disclaimer
text:
This site does not use cookies or track visitors. No personal information is collected unless you contact me via forms or email.




The information provided here is for informational purposes only.

While care is taken to ensure accuracy, no guarantees are made regarding completeness or suitability.

Any external links do not imply endorsement of those sites.

If you have concerns regarding your privacy or site content, please contact me.

title: Home
text:
Data & Analytics Leader | Mentor | Consultant
I am a data and analytics professional with over 15 years of experience in cross-functional project management, leading high-performing teams to deliver actionable insights and digital transformation initiatives.





Transforming insights into impact







Tutoring
Helping students and early-career scientists develop practical skills in data analysis, computational biology, and professional growth.
Explore Tutoring


Coaching
Guiding professionals to unlock career potential and enhance leadership and strategic capabilities.
Explore Coaching


Consulting
Delivering data-driven strategy and digital transformation solutions for corporate teams in life sciences and beyond.
Explore Consulting

title: About
text:
About Dr Ian Henry
I am a PhD-qualified computational biologist and MBA with a focus on digital transformation. I currently lead data science for Translational Medicine at AstraZeneca, guiding teams to deliver actionable insights in drug discovery and development.
Education

MBA (Distinction) – Hult International Business School, 2024

Senior Leaders Master’s Degree (Distinction) – Chartered Management Institute, 2024

PhD Genomics / Computational Biology – University of Nottingham, 2007

BSc Molecular Biology – University of Edinburgh, 2003

Professional Highlights

Over 15 years in data science, genomics, and analytics leadership

Published 25+ papers in high-impact journals

Experienced mentor and team builder

LinkedIn Profile
